content: The secondaries market has grown dramatically in recent years with $132 billion in volume in 2021, up 120% over 2020 with a healthy $108 billion of volume estimated for 2022, and the market is projected to grow at a 22% compound annual growth rate through 2026 per a Morgan Stanley research report. Consistent with the way Bridge operates in its real estate investment funds, Newbury's focus has been on small and middle market transactions, where there is less competition and more attractive pricing.
